snippet.title: Valkyria Chronicles 2 - L55 Battle at Mellvere EX (1 Turn No Damage Method)
snippet.description:
Self explanatory....
Use the trucks on the side of the map to gain cover from the Cannon Tower at the Base Camp. Get behind the front end of the second truck and have a sightline with the Cannon Tower so it faces you (without taking damage) so it exposes it's radiator to the west side and have a Lancer shoot it to destroy it.
